Quote.Author: Francis of Assisi
Quote.QuoteValue: Where there is injury let me sow pardon

Quote.Author: Francis of Assisi
Quote.QuoteValue: Lord, grant that I might not so much seek to be loved as to love

Quote.Author: Francis of Assisi
Quote.QuoteValue: For it is in giving that we receive

Quote.Author: Francois de La Rochefoucauld
Quote.QuoteValue: We are nearer loving those who hate us than those who love us more than we wish

Quote.Author: Francois de La Rochefoucauld
Quote.QuoteValue: True love is like ghosts, which everyone talks about and few have seen

Quote.Author: Francois de La Rochefoucauld
Quote.QuoteValue: Self-interest makes some people blind, and others sharp-sighted

Quote.Author: Francois de La Rochefoucauld
Quote.QuoteValue: If we resist our passions, it is more due to their weakness than our strength

Quote.Author: Francois de La Rochefoucauld
Quote.QuoteValue: Old people love to give good advice; it compensates them for their inability to set a bad example

Quote.Author: Francois de La Rochefoucauld
Quote.QuoteValue: A wise man thinks it more advantageous not to join the battle than to win

Quote.Author: Francois de La Rochefoucauld
Quote.QuoteValue: People always complain about their memories, never about their minds

Quote.Author: Francois de La Rochefoucauld
Quote.QuoteValue: There is only one kind of love, but there are a thousand imitations

Quote.Author: Francois de La Rochefoucauld
Quote.QuoteValue: There is no disguise which can hide love for long where it exists, or simulate it where it does not

Quote.Author: Francois de La Rochefoucauld
Quote.QuoteValue: Flattery is a kind of bad money, to which our vanity gives us currency

Quote.Author: Frank Lloyd Wright
Quote.QuoteValue: Study nature, love nature, stay close to nature. It will never fail you

Quote.Author: Frank Lloyd Wright
Quote.QuoteValue: Less is only more where more is no good

Quote.Author: Frank Lloyd Wright
Quote.QuoteValue: The longer I live, the more beautiful life becomes

Quote.Author: Frank Lloyd Wright
Quote.QuoteValue: A doctor can bury his mistakes but an architect can only advise his clients to plant vines

Quote.Author: Frank Lloyd Wright
Quote.QuoteValue: Simplicity and repose are the qualities that measure the true value of any work of art

Quote.Author: Frank Lloyd Wright
Quote.QuoteValue: Eventually, I think Chicago will be the most beautiful great city left in the world

Quote.Author: Frank Lloyd Wright
Quote.QuoteValue: I believe in God, only I spell it Nature

Quote.Author: Frank Lloyd Wright
Quote.QuoteValue: Television is chewing gum for the eyes

Quote.Author: Frank Lloyd Wright
Quote.QuoteValue: The thing always happens that you really believe in; and the belief in a thing makes it happen

Quote.Author: Frank Lloyd Wright
Quote.QuoteValue: Space is the breath of art

Quote.Author: Frank Sinatra
Quote.QuoteValue: Alcohol may be man's worst enemy, but the bible says love your enemy

Quote.Author: Frank Sinatra
Quote.QuoteValue: The best revenge is massive success

Quote.Author: Frank Sinatra
Quote.QuoteValue: Cock your hat - angles are attitudes

Quote.Author: Frank Sinatra
Quote.QuoteValue: A man doesn't know what happiness is until he's married. By then, it's too late

Quote.Author: Frank Sinatra
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm gonna live till I die

Quote.Author: Frank Sinatra
Quote.QuoteValue: You treat a lady like a dame, and a dame like a lady

Quote.Author: Frank Sinatra
Quote.QuoteValue: I am a thing of beauty

Quote.Author: Frank Sinatra
Quote.QuoteValue: Don't get even, get mad

Quote.Author: Frank Sinatra
Quote.QuoteValue: Whatever else has been said about me personally is unimportant. When I sing, I believe. I'm honest

Quote.Author: Frank Sinatra
Quote.QuoteValue: Nothing anybody's said or written about me ever bothers me, except when it does

Quote.Author: Franklin D. Roosevelt
Quote.QuoteValue: Happiness lies in the joy of achievement and the thrill of creative effort

Quote.Author: Franklin D. Roosevelt
Quote.QuoteValue: In politics, nothing happens by accident. If it happens, you can bet it was planned that way

Quote.Author: Franklin D. Roosevelt
Quote.QuoteValue: When you reach the end of your rope, tie a knot in it and hang on

Quote.Author: Franklin D. Roosevelt
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm not the smartest fellow in the world, but I can sure pick smart colleagues

Quote.Author: Franklin D. Roosevelt
Quote.QuoteValue: The only limit to our realization of tomorrow will be our doubts of today

Quote.Author: Franklin D. Roosevelt
Quote.QuoteValue: To reach a port, we must sail - sail, not tie at anchor - sail, not drift

Quote.Author: Franklin D. Roosevelt
Quote.QuoteValue: I pledge you, I pledge myself, to a new deal for the American people

Quote.Author: Franklin D. Roosevelt
Quote.QuoteValue: I ask you to judge me by the enemies I have made

Quote.Author: Franklin D. Roosevelt
Quote.QuoteValue: There are many ways of going forward, but only one way of standing still

Quote.Author: Franklin D. Roosevelt
Quote.QuoteValue: The only thing we have to fear is fear itself

Quote.Author: Franz Kafka
Quote.QuoteValue: Anyone who keeps the ability to see beauty never grows old

Quote.Author: Franz Kafka
Quote.QuoteValue: Start with what is right rather than what is acceptable

Quote.Author: Franz Kafka
Quote.QuoteValue: So long as you have food in your mouth, you have solved all questions for the time being

Quote.Author: Franz Kafka
Quote.QuoteValue: A book should serve as the ax for the frozen sea within us

Quote.Author: Franz Kafka
Quote.QuoteValue: God gives the nuts, but he does not crack them

Quote.Author: Franz Kafka
Quote.QuoteValue: Evil is whatever distracts

Quote.Author: Franz Kafka
Quote.QuoteValue: If I shall exist eternally, how shall I exist tomorrow?

Quote.Author: Franz Kafka
Quote.QuoteValue: Every revolution evaporates and leaves behind only the slime of a new bureaucracy

Quote.Author: Franz Kafka
Quote.QuoteValue: Always first draw fresh breath after outbursts of vanity and complacency

Quote.Author: Franz Kafka
Quote.QuoteValue: A first sign of the beginning of understanding is the wish to die

Quote.Author: Frederick Douglass
Quote.QuoteValue: If there is no struggle, there is no progress

Quote.Author: Frederick Douglass
Quote.QuoteValue: It is easier to build strong children than to repair broken men

Quote.Author: Frederick Douglass
Quote.QuoteValue: Without a struggle, there can be no progress

Quote.Author: Frederick Douglass
Quote.QuoteValue: What to the Slave is the 4th of July

Quote.Author: Frederick Douglass
Quote.QuoteValue: I prayed for twenty years but received no answer until I prayed with my legs

Quote.Author: Frederick Douglass
Quote.QuoteValue: Power concedes nothing without a demand. It never did and it never will

Quote.Author: Frederick Douglass
Quote.QuoteValue: The thing worse than rebellion is the thing that causes rebellion

Quote.Author: Frederick Douglass
Quote.QuoteValue: The limits of tyrants are prescribed by the endurance of those whom they oppress

Quote.Author: Frederick Douglass
Quote.QuoteValue: At a time like this, scorching irony, not convincing argument, is needed

Quote.Author: Frederick Douglass
Quote.QuoteValue: When men sow the wind it is rational to expect that they will reap the whirlwind

Quote.Author: Frida Kahlo
Quote.QuoteValue: Feet, what do I need you for when I have wings to fly?

Quote.Author: Frida Kahlo
Quote.QuoteValue: I love you more than my own skin

Quote.Author: Frida Kahlo
Quote.QuoteValue: I never paint dreams or nightmares. I paint my own reality

Quote.Author: Frida Kahlo
Quote.QuoteValue: I am my own muse, the subject I know best

Quote.Author: Frida Kahlo
Quote.QuoteValue: I paint self-portraits because I am so often alone, because I am the person I know best

Quote.Author: Frida Kahlo
Quote.QuoteValue: I paint flowers so they will not die

Quote.Author: Frida Kahlo
Quote.QuoteValue: I am in agreement with everything my father taught me and nothing my mother taught me

Quote.Author: Frida Kahlo
Quote.QuoteValue: They thought I was a Surrealist, but I wasn't. I never painted dreams. I painted my own reality

Quote.Author: Frida Kahlo
Quote.QuoteValue: My painting carries with it the message of pain

Quote.Author: Frida Kahlo
Quote.QuoteValue: Painting completed my life

Quote.Author: Friedrich Nietzsche
Quote.QuoteValue: It is not a lack of love, but a lack of friendship that makes unhappy marriages

Quote.Author: Friedrich Nietzsche
Quote.QuoteValue: To live is to suffer, to survive is to find some meaning in the suffering

Quote.Author: Friedrich Nietzsche
Quote.QuoteValue: There is always some madness in love. But there is also always some reason in madness

Quote.Author: Friedrich Nietzsche
Quote.QuoteValue: Thoughts are the shadows of our feelings - always darker, emptier and simpler

Quote.Author: Friedrich Nietzsche
Quote.QuoteValue: Without music, life would be a mistake

Quote.Author: Friedrich Nietzsche
Quote.QuoteValue: All truly great thoughts are conceived by walking

Quote.Author: Friedrich Nietzsche
Quote.QuoteValue: We love life, not because we are used to living but because we are used to loving

Quote.Author: Friedrich Nietzsche
Quote.QuoteValue: The man of knowledge must be able not only to love his enemies but also to hate his friends

Quote.Author: Friedrich Nietzsche
Quote.QuoteValue: That which does not kill us makes us stronger

Quote.Author: Friedrich Nietzsche
Quote.QuoteValue: Love is blind; friendship closes its eyes

Quote.Author: Fyodor Dostoevsky
Quote.QuoteValue: Much unhappiness has come into the world because of bewilderment and things left unsaid

Quote.Author: Fyodor Dostoevsky
Quote.QuoteValue: The cleverest of all, in my opinion, is the man who calls himself a fool at least once a month

Quote.Author: Fyodor Dostoevsky
Quote.QuoteValue: If there is no God, everything is permitted

Quote.Author: Fyodor Dostoevsky
Quote.QuoteValue: To live without Hope is to Cease to live

Quote.Author: Fyodor Dostoevsky
Quote.QuoteValue: The greatest happiness is to know the source of unhappiness

Quote.Author: Fyodor Dostoevsky
Quote.QuoteValue: The soul is healed by being with children

Quote.Author: Fyodor Dostoevsky
Quote.QuoteValue: Happiness does not lie in happiness, but in the achievement of it

Quote.Author: Fyodor Dostoevsky
Quote.QuoteValue: Realists do not fear the results of their study

Quote.Author: Fyodor Dostoevsky
Quote.QuoteValue: The formula 'Two and two make five' is not without its attractions

Quote.Author: Fyodor Dostoevsky
Quote.QuoteValue: It is not possible to eat me without insisting that I sing praises of my devourer?

Quote.Author: Gary Vaynerchuk
Quote.QuoteValue: If I could drink only one wine, it would be Champagne

Quote.Author: Gary Vaynerchuk
Quote.QuoteValue: I influence anybody who is able to get through the chaos of my first impression

Quote.Author: Gary Vaynerchuk
Quote.QuoteValue: When the tech geeks talk, I pay close attention

Quote.Author: Gary Vaynerchuk
Quote.QuoteValue: Word of mouth works now, much more than ever. @-reply every single person

Quote.Author: Gary Vaynerchuk
Quote.QuoteValue: One of my biggest flaws is I don't take advice

Quote.Author: Gary Vaynerchuk
Quote.QuoteValue: Beaujolais is so underrated

Quote.Author: Gary Vaynerchuk
Quote.QuoteValue: People don't want to embrace culture shifts because it's not going to happen in the next 20 minutes

Quote.Author: Gary Vaynerchuk
Quote.QuoteValue: I love people, and the hustle

Quote.Author: Gary Vaynerchuk
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't want anybody to not recognize how appreciative I am of the volume of e-mails I get

Quote.Author: Gary Vaynerchuk
Quote.QuoteValue: From age 16, I lived and breathed wine. I read every magazine and book about wine

Quote.Author: George Bernard Shaw
Quote.QuoteValue: Life isn't about finding yourself. Life is about creating yourself

Quote.Author: George Bernard Shaw
Quote.QuoteValue: We are made wise not by the recollection of our past, but by the responsibility for our future

Quote.Author: George Bernard Shaw
Quote.QuoteValue: The single biggest problem in communication is the illusion that it has taken place

Quote.Author: George Bernard Shaw
Quote.QuoteValue: There is no sincerer love than the love of food

Quote.Author: George Bernard Shaw
Quote.QuoteValue: Better keep yourself clean and bright; you are the window through which you must see the world

Quote.Author: George Bernard Shaw
Quote.QuoteValue: Success does not consist in never making mistakes but in never making the same one a second time

Quote.Author: George Bernard Shaw
Quote.QuoteValue: Beware of false knowledge; it is more dangerous than ignorance

Quote.Author: George Bernard Shaw
Quote.QuoteValue: Take care to get what you like or you will be forced to like what you get

Quote.Author: George Bernard Shaw
Quote.QuoteValue: A happy family is but an earlier heaven

Quote.Author: George Bernard Shaw
Quote.QuoteValue: We don't stop playing because we grow old; we grow old because we stop playing

Quote.Author: George Carlin
Quote.QuoteValue: The other night I ate at a real nice family restaurant. Every table had an argument going

Quote.Author: George Carlin
Quote.QuoteValue: Weather forecast for tonight: dark

Quote.Author: George Carlin
Quote.QuoteValue: There are nights when the wolves are silent and only the moon howls

Quote.Author: George Carlin
Quote.QuoteValue: May the forces of evil become confused on the way to your house

Quote.Author: George Carlin
Quote.QuoteValue: Just cause you got the monkey off your back doesn't mean the circus has left town

Quote.Author: George Carlin
Quote.QuoteValue: Inside every cynical person, there is a disappointed idealist

Quote.Author: George Carlin
Quote.QuoteValue: Frisbeetarianism is the belief that when you die, your soul goes up on the roof and gets stuck

Quote.Author: George Carlin
Quote.QuoteValue: One tequila, two tequila, three tequila, floor

Quote.Author: George Carlin
Quote.QuoteValue: Don't sweat the petty things and don't pet the sweaty things

Quote.Author: George Carlin
Quote.QuoteValue: Electricity is really just organized lightning

Quote.Author: George Eliot
Quote.QuoteValue: It is never too late to be what you might have been

Quote.Author: George Eliot
Quote.QuoteValue: Blessed is the man, who having nothing to say, abstains from giving wordy evidence of the fact

Quote.Author: George Eliot
Quote.QuoteValue: It will never rain roses: when we want to have more roses we must plant more trees

Quote.Author: George Eliot
Quote.QuoteValue: Great things are not done by impulse, but by a series of small things brought together

Quote.Author: George Eliot
Quote.QuoteValue: Wear a smile and have friends; wear a scowl and have wrinkles

Quote.Author: George Eliot
Quote.QuoteValue: The beginning of compunction is the beginning of a new life

Quote.Author: George Eliot
Quote.QuoteValue: Life began with waking up and loving my mother's face

Quote.Author: George Eliot
Quote.QuoteValue: Animals are such agreeable friends - they ask no questions; they pass no criticisms

Quote.Author: George Eliot
Quote.QuoteValue: All meanings, we know, depend on the key of interpretation

Quote.Author: George Eliot
Quote.QuoteValue: People who can't be witty exert themselves to be devout and affectionate

Quote.Author: George Orwell
Quote.QuoteValue: War is peace. Freedom is slavery. Ignorance is strength

Quote.Author: George Orwell
Quote.QuoteValue: Happiness can exist only in acceptance

Quote.Author: George Orwell
Quote.QuoteValue: If liberty means anything at all, it means the right to tell people what they do not want to hear

Quote.Author: George Orwell
Quote.QuoteValue: The very concept of objective truth is fading out of the world. Lies will pass into history

Quote.Author: George Orwell
Quote.QuoteValue: All animals are equal, but some animals are more equal than others

Quote.Author: George Orwell
Quote.QuoteValue: Freedom is the right to tell people what they do not want to hear

Quote.Author: George Orwell
Quote.QuoteValue: The essence of being human is that one does not seek perfection

Quote.Author: George Orwell
Quote.QuoteValue: Who controls the past controls the future. Who controls the present controls the past

Quote.Author: George Orwell
Quote.QuoteValue: For a creative writer possession of the 'truth' is less important than emotional sincerity

Quote.Author: George Orwell
Quote.QuoteValue: There are some ideas so wrong that only a very intelligent person could believe in them

Quote.Author: George S. Patton
Quote.QuoteValue: Accept the challenges so that you can feel the exhilaration of victory

Quote.Author: George S. Patton
Quote.QuoteValue: The object of war is not to die for your country but to make the other bastard die for his

Quote.Author: George S. Patton
Quote.QuoteValue: A good plan violently executed now is better than a perfect plan executed next week

Quote.Author: George S. Patton
Quote.QuoteValue: If everyone is thinking alike, then somebody isn't thinking

Quote.Author: George S. Patton
Quote.QuoteValue: It is foolish and wrong to mourn the men who died. Rather we should thank God that such men lived

Quote.Author: George S. Patton
Quote.QuoteValue: Success is how high you bounce when you hit bottom

Quote.Author: George S. Patton
Quote.QuoteValue: Better to fight for something than live for nothing

Quote.Author: George S. Patton
Quote.QuoteValue: You need to overcome the tug of people against you as you reach for high goals

Quote.Author: George S. Patton
Quote.QuoteValue: If you tell people where to go, but not how to get there, you'll be amazed at the results

Quote.Author: George S. Patton
Quote.QuoteValue: Take calculated risks. That is quite different from being rash

Quote.Author: George Sand
Quote.QuoteValue: There is only one happiness in this life, to love and be loved

Quote.Author: George Sand
Quote.QuoteValue: Try to keep your soul young and quivering right up to old age

Quote.Author: George Sand
Quote.QuoteValue: The prayers of a lover are more imperious than the menaces of the whole world

Quote.Author: George Sand
Quote.QuoteValue: Admiration and familiarity are strangers

Quote.Author: George Sand
Quote.QuoteValue: Life in common among people who love each other is the ideal of happiness

Quote.Author: George Sand
Quote.QuoteValue: Every historian discloses a new horizon

Quote.Author: George Sand
Quote.QuoteValue: One changes from day to day, and... after a few years have passed one has completely altered

Quote.Author: George Sand
Quote.QuoteValue: Work is not man's punishment. It is his reward and his strength and his pleasure

Quote.Author: George Sand
Quote.QuoteValue: Vanity is the quicksand of reason

Quote.Author: George Sand
Quote.QuoteValue: No human creature can give orders to love

Quote.Author: George Santayana
Quote.QuoteValue: The family is one of nature's masterpieces

Quote.Author: George Santayana
Quote.QuoteValue: Those who do not remember the past are condemned to repeat it

Quote.Author: George Santayana
Quote.QuoteValue: When men and women agree, it is only in their conclusions; their reasons are always different

Quote.Author: George Santayana
Quote.QuoteValue: Nonsense is so good only because common sense is so limited

Quote.Author: George Santayana
Quote.QuoteValue: A child educated only at school is an uneducated child

Quote.Author: George Santayana
Quote.QuoteValue: Never build your emotional life on the weaknesses of others

Quote.Author: George Santayana
Quote.QuoteValue: Only the dead have seen the end of the war

Quote.Author: George Santayana
Quote.QuoteValue: An artist is a dreamer consenting to dream of the actual world

Quote.Author: George Santayana
Quote.QuoteValue: Chaos is a name for any order that produces confusion in our minds

Quote.Author: George Santayana
Quote.QuoteValue: Nothing can so pierce the soul as the uttermost sigh of the body

Quote.Author: George W. Bush
Quote.QuoteValue: You can fool some of the people all the time, and those are the ones you want to concentrate on

Quote.Author: George W. Bush
Quote.QuoteValue: The wisest use of American strength is to advance freedom

Quote.Author: George W. Bush
Quote.QuoteValue: There's no bigger task than protecting the homeland of our country

Quote.Author: George W. Bush
Quote.QuoteValue: Do I think faith will be an important part of being a good president? Yes, I do

Quote.Author: George W. Bush
Quote.QuoteValue: Freedom itself was attacked this morning by a faceless coward, and freedom will be defended

Quote.Author: George W. Bush
Quote.QuoteValue: I believe that God has planted in every heart the desire to live in freedom

Quote.Author: George W. Bush
Quote.QuoteValue: I want to thank you for taking time out of your day to come and witness my hanging

Quote.Author: George W. Bush
Quote.QuoteValue: Some folks look at me and see a certain swagger, which in Texas is called 'walking.'

Quote.Author: George W. Bush
Quote.QuoteValue: It's going to be the year of the sharp elbow and the quick tongue

Quote.Author: George W. Bush
Quote.QuoteValue: You can't put democracy and freedom back into a box

Quote.Author: George Washington
Quote.QuoteValue: It is far better to be alone, than to be in bad company

Quote.Author: George Washington
Quote.QuoteValue: Observe good faith and justice toward all nations. Cultivate peace and harmony with all

Quote.Author: George Washington
Quote.QuoteValue: Guard against the impostures of pretended patriotism

Quote.Author: George Washington
Quote.QuoteValue: To be prepared for war is one of the most effective means of preserving peace

Quote.Author: George Washington
Quote.QuoteValue: Truth will ultimately prevail where there is pains to bring it to light

Quote.Author: George Washington
Quote.QuoteValue: Worry is the interest paid by those who borrow trouble

Quote.Author: George Washington
Quote.QuoteValue: Happiness and moral duty are inseparably connected

Quote.Author: George Washington
Quote.QuoteValue: The Constitution is the guide which I never will abandon

Quote.Author: George Washington
Quote.QuoteValue: Let us raise a standard to which the wise and honest can repair; the rest is in the hands of God

Quote.Author: George Washington
Quote.QuoteValue: It is better to offer no excuse than a bad one

Quote.Author: Georgia O'Keeffe
Quote.QuoteValue: I decided that if I could paint that flower in a huge scale, you could not ignore its beauty

Quote.Author: Georgia O'Keeffe
Quote.QuoteValue: To create one's world in any of the arts takes courage

Quote.Author: Georgia O'Keeffe
Quote.QuoteValue: You get whatever accomplishment you are willing to declare

Quote.Author: Georgia O'Keeffe
Quote.QuoteValue: I hate flowers - I paint them because they're cheaper than models and they don't move

Quote.Author: Georgia O'Keeffe
Quote.QuoteValue: I decided to start anew, to strip away what I had been taught

Quote.Author: Georgia O'Keeffe
Quote.QuoteValue: The days you work are the best days

Quote.Author: Georgia O'Keeffe
Quote.QuoteValue: I had to create an equivalent for what I felt about what I was looking at - not copy it

Quote.Author: Georgia O'Keeffe
Quote.QuoteValue: Anyone who doesn't feel the crosses simply doesn't get that country

Quote.Author: Georgia O'Keeffe
Quote.QuoteValue: One can't paint New York as it is, but rather as it is felt

Quote.Author: Georgia O'Keeffe
Quote.QuoteValue: I feel there is something unexplored about woman that only a woman can explore

Quote.Author: Gilbert K. Chesterton
Quote.QuoteValue: The traveler sees what he sees, the tourist sees what he has come to see

Quote.Author: Gilbert K. Chesterton
Quote.QuoteValue: There are no rules of architecture for a castle in the clouds

Quote.Author: Gilbert K. Chesterton
Quote.QuoteValue: One sees great things from the valley; only small things from the peak

Quote.Author: Gilbert K. Chesterton
Quote.QuoteValue: Marriage is an adventure, like going to war

Quote.Author: Gilbert K. Chesterton
Quote.QuoteValue: The way to love anything is to realize that it may be lost

Quote.Author: Gilbert K. Chesterton
Quote.QuoteValue: The true object of all human life is play. Earth is a task garden; heaven is a playground

Quote.Author: Gilbert K. Chesterton
Quote.QuoteValue: An inconvenience is an adventure wrongly considered

Quote.Author: Gilbert K. Chesterton
Quote.QuoteValue: Do not free a camel of the burden of his hump; you may be freeing him from being a camel

Quote.Author: Gilbert K. Chesterton
Quote.QuoteValue: All slang is metaphor, and all metaphor is poetry

Quote.Author: Gilbert K. Chesterton
Quote.QuoteValue: Tolerance is the virtue of the man without convictions

Quote.Author: Gloria Steinem
Quote.QuoteValue: The problem for all women is we're identified by how we look instead of by our heads and our hearts

Quote.Author: Gloria Steinem
Quote.QuoteValue: Being misunderstood by people whose opinions you value is absolutely the most painful

Quote.Author: Gloria Steinem
Quote.QuoteValue: A woman without a man is like a fish without a bicycle

Quote.Author: Gloria Steinem
Quote.QuoteValue: Law and justice are not always the same

Quote.Author: Gloria Steinem
Quote.QuoteValue: We need to remember across generations that there is as much to learn as there is to teach

Quote.Author: Gloria Steinem
Quote.QuoteValue: Some of us are becoming the men we wanted to marry

Quote.Author: Gloria Steinem
Quote.QuoteValue: The future depends entirely on what each of us does every day; a movement is only people moving

Quote.Author: Gloria Steinem
Quote.QuoteValue: Pearl Jam doesn't just sing about issues they care about. These guys walk it like they talk it

Quote.Author: Gloria Steinem
Quote.QuoteValue: Logic is in the eye of the logician

Quote.Author: Gloria Steinem
Quote.QuoteValue: Most women are one man away from welfare

Quote.Author: Gore Vidal
Quote.QuoteValue: Style is knowing who you are, what you want to say, and not giving a damn

Quote.Author: Gore Vidal
Quote.QuoteValue: Write something, even if it's just a suicide note

Quote.Author: Gore Vidal
Quote.QuoteValue: At any given moment, public opinion is a chaos of superstition, misinformation and prejudice

Quote.Author: Gore Vidal
Quote.QuoteValue: Whenever a friend succeeds, a little something in me dies

Quote.Author: Gore Vidal
Quote.QuoteValue: Andy Warhol is the only genius I've ever known with an I.Q. of 60

Quote.Author: Gore Vidal
Quote.QuoteValue: Some writers take to drink, others take to audiences

Quote.Author: Gore Vidal
Quote.QuoteValue: Never have children, only grandchildren

Quote.Author: Gore Vidal
Quote.QuoteValue: Our form of democracy is bribery, on the highest scale

Quote.Author: Gore Vidal
Quote.QuoteValue: Litigation takes the place of sex at middle age

Quote.Author: Gore Vidal
Quote.QuoteValue: The four most beautiful words in our common language: I told you so

Quote.Author: Groucho Marx
Quote.QuoteValue: Outside of a dog, a book is a man's best friend. Inside of a dog it's too dark to read

Quote.Author: Groucho Marx
Quote.QuoteValue: The secret of life is honesty and fair dealing. If you can fake that, you've got it made

Quote.Author: Groucho Marx
Quote.QuoteValue: One morning I shot an elephant in my pajamas. How he got into my pajamas I'll never know

Quote.Author: Groucho Marx
Quote.QuoteValue: A black cat crossing your path signifies that the animal is going somewhere

Quote.Author: Groucho Marx
Quote.QuoteValue: Anyone who says he can see through women is missing a lot

Quote.Author: Groucho Marx
Quote.QuoteValue: I've had a perfectly wonderful evening. But this wasn't it

Quote.Author: Groucho Marx
Quote.QuoteValue: I refuse to join any club that would have me as a member

Quote.Author: Groucho Marx
Quote.QuoteValue: Behind every successful man is a woman, behind her is his wife

Quote.Author: Groucho Marx
Quote.QuoteValue: Who are you going to believe, me or your own eyes?

Quote.Author: Groucho Marx
Quote.QuoteValue: A hospital bed is a parked taxi with the meter running

Quote.Author: H. Jackson Brown, Jr.
Quote.QuoteValue: The best preparation for tomorrow is doing your best today

Quote.Author: H. Jackson Brown, Jr.
Quote.QuoteValue: Sometimes the heart sees what is invisible to the eye

Quote.Author: H. Jackson Brown, Jr.
Quote.QuoteValue: Remember that the most valuable antiques are dear old friends

Quote.Author: H. Jackson Brown, Jr.
Quote.QuoteValue: Love is when the other person's happiness is more important than your own

Quote.Author: H. Jackson Brown, Jr.
Quote.QuoteValue: Live so that when your children think of fairness, caring, and integrity, they think of you

Quote.Author: H. Jackson Brown, Jr.
Quote.QuoteValue: Remember that children, marriages, and flower gardens reflect the kind of care they get

Quote.Author: H. Jackson Brown, Jr.
Quote.QuoteValue: Remember that the happiest people are not those getting more, but those giving more
